name: Copy Content Of Group To Clipboard
plugin_instructions:
1 - Give your group an ID.

To set the ID for an element, you will have to enable 'Expose the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements' inside Settings -> general (under general appearance)

2 - When creating a workflow, you will access to the 'Copy content of group to clipboard' workflow action. Place your element ID of the group you want to copy in this action and you are done! Every-time this action runs, the (text) content of that group will be saved to the clipboard.
